data.name: Cherry Island
data.detailed_description:
Fighting in a world of trouble.


The officer Willow is working for the Nations Defensive Alliance (NDA) to protect the islands of Cherry near from the Caribbean sea.
The threat ? A war engineering society invading the earth for bad reasons: the Z Corporation
From a first person shooter to a simulation view, including jets, boats or armored vehcules, that 3d game give you intense solo action.
Feel the opportunity to experiment a life of danger, from solo war gameplay to various arcade simulations and situations.
Additional content will be added to this product over the months.

Details
  • Dozens of controlable vehicles (attack jet, yachts, war cargo, civilian vehicles).
  • Enter the battle of two bots factions where you will make the difference for your side.
  • Custom missions gives you direct access to various actions that you can find during the history mod.

Next release
This game is in bêta stage, contributions for the performance of the software are planned. Purchasing current version gives you access to new missions update package called Act II : Z Corporation part (To be released in 2020)

data.short_description: "FPS and simulator" The officer Willow is working for the Nations Defensive Alliance (NDA) to protect the fictional islands of Cherry. The threat ? A war engineering society invading the earth for bad reasons: the Z Corporation.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7(64-bit), Windows 8.1(64-bit) and Windows 10(64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4790 / AMD FX 8350 Wraith
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11.0 Compatible video card (AMD Radeon RX 480 4GB / nVidia GeForce GTX 1060 3GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card, speaker or headphone
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7(64-bit), Windows 8.1(64-bit) and Windows 10(64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4790 / AMD FX 8350 Wraith
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11.0 Compatible video card (AMD Radeon RX 480 4GB / nVidia GeForce GTX 1060 3GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card, speaker or headphone

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scenes of wars, mutilated characters (Zombies), gratuitous acts of violence can be present according to the attitudes of the player
